  • Method Details

    • getNodeByUuid

      NodeVO getNodeByUuid(String uuid)
      Retrieves a graph node by its UUID.
      Parameters:
      uuid - the UUID of the graph node
      Returns:
      the graph node

    • createNode

      NodeVO createNode(String graphUuid, String nodeUuid, String relationUuid, String currentTime, NodeDTO nodeDTO, org.neo4j.driver.Transaction tx)
      Creates a node in the Neo4j database.
      Parameters:
      graphUuid - the UUID of the graph
      nodeUuid - the UUID of the node
      relationUuid - the UUID of the link between the created node and the graph this node belongs to
      currentTime - the current time
      nodeDTO - the NodeDTO object containing the node properties
      tx - the Neo4j transaction
      Returns:
      the created Node object

    • getRelationByGraphUuid

      GetRelationDTO getRelationByGraphUuid(String uuid, Map<String,String> properties, Integer pageNumber, Integer pageSize)
      Retrieves all relationships by graph uuid.
      Parameters:
      uuid - the UUID of the graph
      properties - the filter properties of the node
      pageNumber - the page number
      pageSize - the page size
      Returns:
      Data Transfer Object (DTO) contains relations and nodes

    • kDegreeExpansion

      GraphVO kDegreeExpansion(String graphUuid, String nodeUuid, Integer k)
      Retrieves a k-degree expansion of a node in the graph.
      Parameters:
      graphUuid - the UUID of the graph
      nodeUuid - the UUID of the node to expand
      k - the degree of expansion
      Returns:
      a GraphVO object containing the expanded nodes and their relationships

    • bindGraphNodeToGraphNode

      void bindGraphNodeToGraphNode(String uuid1, String uuid2, String relation, String relationUuid, String currentTime, org.neo4j.driver.Transaction tx)
      Binds two graph nodes with a specified relationship.
      Parameters:
      uuid1 - the UUID of the first graph node
      uuid2 - the UUID of the second graph node
      relation - the name of the relationship
      relationUuid - the UUID of the link between the created node and the graph this node belongs to
      currentTime - the current timestamp
      tx - the Neo4j transaction

    • updateNodeByUuid

      void updateNodeByUuid(NodeUpdateDTO nodeUpdateDTO, String currentTime, org.neo4j.driver.Transaction tx)
      Updates a graph node by its UUID.
      Parameters:
      nodeUpdateDTO - the NodeUpdateDTO object containing the updated node properties
      currentTime - the current time for update
      tx - the Neo4j transaction
